Reading Time: < 1 minuteAs CIO one of my key success factor is to choose the good companies to work with.

Based on my experience, the most important criteria is LEADERSHIP.

Leadership to guide me (a customer does not necessary knows what he needs…)
Leadership to propose solutions
Leadership to take the good decisions to be efficient
Leadership to show the direction.

Leadership is the result of companies culture (do they encourage their staff to take risks? ) but depends even more  on individuals.
